channel.name: Channel
channel.description: Input the channel here you want to receive messages from.

tokenConfig.name: Token (DO NOT share)
tokenConfig.description: This settings contains your Twitch Token. DO NOT share this token. If you accidental show your token press the 'Revoke' button in the token config.

token.name: Twitch Token
token.description: This is your Twitch Token. DO NOT share this token. If you accidental show your token press the 'Revoke' button.

authorize.name: Generate Twitch Token
authorize.description: Click here to generate your Twitch Token.

revoke.name: Revoke Twitch Token
revoke.description: Click here to revoke your Twitch Token.

soundOnMessage.name: Sound on Message
soundOnMessage.description: Should a sound play when you receive a message.

showTwitchEmotes.name: Display Twitch Emotes
showTwitchEmotes.description: Should Twitch Emotes be rendered or shown as plain text.

showSevenTvEmotes.name: Display 7TV Emotes
showSevenTvEmotes.description: Should 7TV Emotes be rendered or shown as plain text.

showBetterTtvEmotes.name: Display BTTV Emotes
showBetterTtvEmotes.description: Should BetterTTV Emotes be rendered or shown as plain text.

showFrankerFaceZ.name: Display FFZ Emotes
showFrankerFaceZ.description: Should FrankerFaceZ Emotes be rendered or shown as plain text.

activity.text: A new window opened with the Twitch Authentication.

command.channel: You need to select a channel before you can sent a message.

chat.connecting: Connecting to chat please try again in a moment.
